import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Post } from '../../../types/blog.type' import { AppContext } from '../../../contexts/app.context' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' interface Props { item: Post onDeletePost: (id: string) => void } // destructuring const PostItem = ({ item, onDeletePost }: Props) => { const { isEdit, setIsEdit } = useContext(AppContext); const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleEditPost = (id: string) => { setIsEdit(!isEdit) } return (
{item.publishDate}

{item.title}

{item.description}

) } export default PostItem
